comment.author: 89712453@N00
comment._content: Assuming this is actually *in* Boston, this would likely be the Huntington Avenue Grounds. Not too many photos of that ballpark floating around the web, alas. I can't quite match this photo with the others that exist: www.geocities.com/colosseum/arena/5866/hunting.jpg
